legal_provisions.act: Legal Practitioners and Bar Council Act, 1973

key_findings.misconduct: Obtained license before completing LL.B exam using a provisional certificate later found to be bogus.
key_findings.license_status: Cancelled for both subordinate courts and Peshawar High Court
key_findings.financial_penalty: Not imposed due to respondent's financial condition

recommendations.disciplinary_action: Cancellation of licenses for subordinate courts and Peshawar High Court
recommendations.notification: To be issued by Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Bar Council

references.case_name: Qamar Zaman Shinwari v. S. Nadir Shah Gillani Advocate
